success_action.heading: Thank you!
success_action.message:
Please check your email and follow the instructions to
activate your account.

login_modal.welcome_back: Welcome back! Please enter your details.

name.min: Name must be at least 3 characters
name.max: Name must be at most 15 characters

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.max: Password must be at most 15 characters

title.ka.max: Title in Georgian must be between 1 and 45 characters

title.en.max: Title in English must be between 1 and 45 characters

release_year.length: Release year must be exactly 4 digits

director_name.ka.required: Director's name in Georgian is required
director_name.ka.georgian: Director's name must be in Georgian
director_name.ka.max: Director's name in Georgian must be between 1 and 45 characters

director_name.en.required: Director's name in English is required
director_name.en.english: Director's name must be in English
director_name.en.max: Director's name in English must be between 1 and 45 characters

description.ka.max: Description in Georgian must be between 1 and 500 characters

description.en.max: Description in English must be between 1 and 500 characters

genres.required: Please select at least one genre

forgot_password_modal.forgot_password_message: Enter the email and we’ll send an email with instructions to reset your password

success_action.heading: Check your email
success_action.message: We have sent a password recover instructions to your email

reset_password_modal.reset_password_message: Your new password must be different from previous used passwords

password.label: Password
password.placeholder: At least 8 & max.15 lower case characters

fail_action.heading: Link expired!
fail_action.message: Login link has expired, because you haven’t used it
